section.title: Using extensions
section.para: An extension is a collection of functions that may be shared between different spec files

formalpara.title: The inherit function
formalpara.para: To use extension it must be inherited. This is done using inherit function and it automatically sources relevant extension from _SPECSDIR/ext directory.

formalpara.title: Filename inherit
formalpara.para: It is possible to specify single extension inherit through filename, e.g. devball:gem-0.9.spec will inherit gem extension.

tip.para: Using filename inherit it is possible to create generic extension that will handle multiple similar specs, while each spec would be an empty file.
